titlestmt.titleproper: Finding aid for the Great Lakes Basin framework study : appendix / prepared by Surface Water Hydrology Work Group ... [et al.] ; sponsored by U.S. Department of the Army Corps of Engineers ... [et al.].

profiledesc.creation: Encoded finding aid created from MARC record by Dallas Pillen
profiledesc.langusage: The finding aid is written in English

did.unittitle: Great Lakes Basin framework study : appendix / prepared by Surface Water Hydrology Work Group ... [et al.] ; sponsored by U.S. Department of the Army Corps of Engineers ... [et al.].

odd.head: Publication, Distribution, Etc.
odd.p: Ann Arbor, Mich. : Public Information Office, Great Lakes Basin Commission, [1975-1976]

odd.head: Formatted Contents Note
odd.p: 1. Alternative framewoks -- 1, Annex B. Procedures for determination of alternative futures -- 1, Annex D. Issues and alternatives -- 1, Annex E. Programs and costs -- 2. Surface water hydrology -- 3. Geology and ground water -- 4. Limnology of lakes and embayments -- 5. Mineral resources -- 6. Water supply: municipal, industrial, and rural -- 7. Water quality -- 8. Fish -- C9. Commercial navigation -- R9. Recreational boating -- 10. Power -- 11. Levels and flows -- 12. Shore use and erosion -- 13. Land use and management -- 14. Flood plains -- 15. Irrigation -- 16. Drainage -- 17. Wildlife -- 18. Erosion and sedimentation -- 19. Economic and demographic studies -- F20. Federal laws, policies, and institutional arrangements -- S20. State laws, policies, and institutional arrangements -- 21. Outdoor recreation -- 22. Aesthetic and cultural resources -- 23. Health aspects.

odd.head: General Note
odd.p: Prepared under the auspices of the Commission.

odd.head: General Note
odd.p: Appendix to the Commission's Report of the Great Lakes Basin framework study.

corpname.term: Report of the Great Lakes Basin framework study.
